title: Synergistic inhibition of ureolytic activity and growth of Klebsiella pneumoniae in vitro suggests cobinding of fluoride and acetohydroxamic acid at the urease active site and provides a novel strategy to combat ureolytic bacteria
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Simon Svane, Mie C. Lyngsie, Janne K. Klitgaard, Henrik Karring
